mapper.select: select count(*) from ${tableName} where standard_name=#{standardName} and date like CONCAT('%', #{nowDate}, '%')
select json_data from ${tableName} where standard_name=#{standardName} and date like CONCAT('%', #{nowDate}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into short_weather(baseDate, fcstTime, category, fcstDate, fcstValue, nx, ny, updated, area) values (#{baseDate},#{fcstTime},#{category},#{fcstDate},#{fcstValue},#{nx},#{ny},0,#{area})
mapper.select: select * from short_weather where category in ("POP","PCP","REH","TMP","UUU","VVV","VEC","SKY") and area=#{area} and updated = 0
select * from short_weather where fcstDate=#{fcstDate} and fcstTime=#{fcstTime} and area=#{area} and updated = 0
select * from short_weather where area=#{area} and category=#{category} and fcstTime=#{fcstTime} and fcstDate=#{fcstDate}
select * from short_weather where area=#{area} and category=#{category} and fcstDate=#{fcstDate}
select * from short_weather where area=#{area} and category=#{category} and fcstTime=#{fcstTime}
